New Records: The Hornets are on a 10-game losing streak entering the game.
Pre-Game Insights: The Hornets are struggling at home with a 5-13 record.
The Suns have a strong three-point shooting average of 14.2 per game.

Miscellaneous Highlights: The Hornets lead the Eastern Conference in rebounds, averaging 45.9 per game.

Others: The game is noted as the Hornets' 12th game of the season.
